form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Udall (for himself, Ms. Murkowski, Ms. Heitkamp, Mr. Tester, Mr. Franken, Mr. Heinrich, and Mr. Schatz) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Native American Programs Act of 1974 to provide flexibility and reauthorization to ensure the survival and continuing vitality of Native American languages.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Native American Languages Reauthorization Act of 2015.
Section 803C of the Native American Programs Act of 1974 (42 U.S.C. 2991b–3) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A)(i), by striking 10 and inserting 5; and
in subparagraph (B)(i), by striking 15 and inserting 10; and
by striking or 3-year basis and inserting 3-year, 4-year, or 5-year basis; and
by inserting , 4-year, or 5-year after on a 3-year.

section.header: Reauthorization of Native American languages program

subsection.text: Section 816(e) of the Native American Programs Act of 1974 (42 U.S.C. 2992d(e)) is amended by striking 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, and 2012 and inserting 2016 through 2020.
Section 816 of the Native American Programs Act of 1974 (42 U.S.C. 2992d) is amended in subsections (a) and (b) by striking subsection (e) each place it appears and inserting subsection (d).
